metadata.description: Lextech Claude Code plugins for .NET 10 Clean Architecture microservices

plugins.name: lextech-dotnet
plugins.description: Lextech .NET 10 Clean Architecture microservice standards. 4 agents, 8 commands, 9 skills, and standards enforcement hooks for Vertical Slice, Contract-First OpenAPI, Dapper/PostgreSQL, Wolverine CQRS, and Azure services.
